Class GuestUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelsystem.ui.GuestUI

  • public class GuestUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Description of Guest UI Prints out guest interface options to add, retrieve, update or delete guest

    17/04/2018

    1.0
    Author:
    Kan Kah Seng
